p: Long term consumption of oxidized oils has been reported to not only result in growth retardation, but cause liver enlargement [ 11, 45, 46, 47, 48]. In this study, the palm oil-based groups—HPO and HPOC—resulted in heavier liver weights than the corn oil-based groups, HCO and HCOC. No differences in heart weights and ALT levels were observed among the four dietary groups.
